scripts.changelog:add-and-commit: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.push:origin-and-tags: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && pnpm changelog:add-and-commit && pnpm version major && pnpm push:origin-and-tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && pnpm changelog:add-and-commit && pnpm version minor && pnpm push:origin-and-tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && pnpm changelog:add-and-commit && pnpm version patch && pnpm push:origin-and-tags
